metadata.Title: CVE-2019-18179 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Open Ticket Request System (OTRS) 7.0.x through7.0.12, and Community Edition 5.0.x through 5.0.38 and 6.0.x through6.0.23. An attacker who is logged into OTRS as an agent is able to listtickets assigned to other agents, even tickets in a queue where theattacker doesn't have permissions.

criterions.comment: otrs2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
